resources.string: Note: If you did not setup a screen lock, Android will refuse to store the security settings!
This application configures the Selfnet Wi-Fi® for your smartphone.
If you face any issues connecting to the wireless LAN please check whether you typed in your password and email address correctly.\nIf this doesn\'t help contact support@selfnet.de.
Email address ends with whitespaces - please remove them.

A Wi-Fi connection entry with the correct security settings was created.\n\nIf you face problems connecting to the Selfnet Wi-Fi® please check whether you\'ve provided the correct credentials. This message only confirms the profile\'s creation but doesn\'t validate you username and password.
Please provide your Wi-Fi® credentials from MySelfnet.
